questions.question: What is the name for a set of acceptable behaviors for using a computer and the Internet?
What is using others' ideas or work without giving them credit called?
What is the technique of acknowledging the source of information to avoid plagiarism?
What is threatening or harassing a person using the Internet called?
What is the name for a person who gains unauthorized access to computer systems?
What type of hacker breaks into systems to fix flaws and improve security?
What is the Internet fraud technique that steals sensitive information using fake emails called?
What is phishing using phone calls or voice messages called?
What are unwanted emails sent in bulk called?
What is sending the same email repeatedly to a particular address called?
What is sending requests to a resource many times more than it can handle called?
What is the software that prevents, detects, and removes malicious programs called?
What is the system that keeps check on incoming and outgoing network information called?
What is a malicious program that attacks computers called?
What is a program that surveys your Internet behavior and copies passwords called?
What is a program that places advertisements and allows pop-ups called?
What programs can read keystrokes pressed by users?
What is a small piece of data that collects information of online activity called?
What is the information about a user from their online activity called?
What is illegal copying and distribution of software without license called?
What protects the rights of creators over their literary or artistic works?
What identifies and distinguishes products of one company from others?
What gives the creator the sole right to make, use, and sell an invention?
What is non-public information about commercial practices owned by a business called?
What law protects children under 13 years of age online?
What is buying and selling of goods and services online called?
What is crime conducted on and propagated through the Internet called?
What is using the Internet to stalk or harass a person called?
What is obtaining secrets without permission and knowledge of the holder called?
What is using Internet to carry out violent activities causing loss of life called?
